term-referencing-test.title: Term referencing test
term-referencing-test.description: Test checking if each term is linked to a module through a rdfs:isDefineBy property

Pass.title: Any term is referenced
Pass.description: Each term of the test subject is linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject syntax must be correct

CantTell.title: Term not referenced to a module
CantTell.description: A term of the fragment is not linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

Fail.title: Term not referenced to a module
Fail.description: A term of the fragment is not linked to a module by a rdfs:isDefinedBy property

domain-and-range-referencing-test.title: Domain or range out of vocabulary
domain-and-range-referencing-test.description: Test checking if each range of domain of any property is defined within the fragment

Pass.title: Domains properly defined
Pass.description: Each rdfs:domain is defined within the fragment

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The syntax of the subject and any of its imports must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: Domain out of vocabulary
CantTell.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:domain defined out of the vocabulary

Fail.title: Domain out of vocabulary
Fail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:domain defined out of the vocabulary

Pass.title: Ranges properly defined
Pass.description: Each rdfs:range is defined within the fragment

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The syntax of the subject and any of its imports must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: Range out of vocabulary
CantTell.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:range defined out of the vocabulary

Fail.title: Range out of vocabulary
Fail.description: A property defined in the fragment has a rdfs:range defined out of the vocabulary

terms-differenciation-test.title: Test of terms differenciation
terms-differenciation-test.description: Test checking if each term of the subject have a Levenshtein distance high enough from each other

Pass.title: Terms differenciated enough
Pass.description: All the terms have have a satisfying Levenshtein distance from each other term.

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject needs to be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: Too close terms
CantTell.description: Two terms defined in the fragment have a Levenshtein distance too low

Fail.title: Too close terms
Fail.description: Two terms defined in the fragment have a Levenshtein distance too low

syntax-test.title: Syntax test
syntax-test.description: A test meant to check wether the test subject is syntaxically correct or not.

Pass.title: Correct syntax
Pass.description: Test subject has a correct syntax

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The file needs to be found

CantTell.title: Test subject has syntax errors
CantTell.description: The subject has turtle syntax errors

Fail.title: Test subject has syntax errors
Fail.description: The subject has turtle syntax errors

owl-rl-constraint-test.title: OWL RL Constraint violation test
owl-rl-constraint-test.description: A test meant to check if a OWL RL constraint is violated

Pass.title: OWL RL consistent
Pass.description: The provided graph is consistent for any OWL RL constraint

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject and its recursive imports must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: OWL RL Constraint violation
CantTell.description: The fragment violates at least one OWL violation

Fail.title: OWL RL Constraint violation
Fail.description: The fragment violates at least one OWL violation

profile-test.title: OWL Profile Compatibility Test
profile-test.description: Test for the compatibility of the subject for the OWL Profile

Pass.title: OWL TC Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL TC sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: OWL TC Profile incompatible
CantTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL TC sublanguage

Fail.title: OWL TC Profile incompatible
Fail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL TC sublanguage

Pass.title: OWL RL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL RL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: OWL RL Profile incompatible
CantTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL RL sublanguage

Fail.title: OWL RL Profile incompatible
Fail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL RL sublanguage

Pass.title: OWL QL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL QL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: OWL QL Profile incompatible
CantTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL QL sublanguage

Fail.title: OWL QL Profile incompatible
Fail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL QL sublanguage

Pass.title: OWL EL Profile compatible
Pass.description: The subject is included in the OWL EL sublanguage

NotTested.title: The test could not be run
NotTested.description: The subject must be syntaxically correct

CantTell.title: OWL EL Profile incompatible
CantTell.description: The subject is not included in the OWL EL sublanguage

Fail.title: OWL EL Profile incompatible
Fail.description: The subject is not included in the OWL EL sublanguage
